info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON... SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...NORTHWESTERN GREENE...OHIO...MARSHALL... BROOKE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 322 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Steubenville, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Weirton, Steubenville, Wellsburg, West Liberty, Triadelphia, Avella, Clearview, Valley Grove, Wintersville, Mingo Junction, Follansbee, Hooverson Heights, Tiltonsville, Yorkville, Bethany, West Finley, Smithfield, Claysville, Franklin, and Beech Bottom. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 6 and 14. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
